name: No Refrence
description:
Find the red vases in a wave of white in this short artsy game.

the game can be played with a PlayStation controller

Know bugs:

The vases can go through walls

The character makes small hops when walking backwards

Logo and objects made by:  Joasimlau
programming made by: Tr4shL0rd and Joasimlau

Game and name ideas made by: Joasimlau and Janik
